mapper.sql: id, name,code,password, phone, address, money, rule_id
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, password, phone, address, money, rule_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update user set password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
